# Load notes

Load files that contain any notes or test metadata

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  notes <- readRDS("../r_files/notes.RDS")
  notes_kf <- readRDS("../r_files/notes_kf.RDS")
```

# Add flags

* Add qc status and inst to `notes` file

With default value `good` for `all` insts in no notes; `maybe` for `all` if note was that hood 2 was running/other tests occuring nearby.

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  notes <- dplyr::mutate(notes,
                          inst = ifelse(grepl("", notes),
                                              "all", 
                                              ""),
                          qc = ifelse(grepl("", notes),
                                             "maybe",
                                             ""),
                          inst = ifelse(is.na(notes),
                                               "all",
                                               inst),
                          qc = ifelse(is.na(notes),
                                       "good",
                                       qc),
                          inst = ifelse(grepl("carbonyl", notes),
                                              "carbonyl",
                                              inst),
                          qc = ifelse(grepl("carbonyl", notes),
                                       "bad",
                                       qc),
                          inst = ifelse(grepl("hood|charcoal",
                                               notes),
                                               "all",
                                               inst),
                          qc = ifelse(grepl("hood|charcoal",
                                             notes),
                                             "maybe",
                                             qc)) %>%
            rename(notes_log = notes)
```

# Organize 

Compile the two note files into one.

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  notes_kf <- notes_kf %>%
              dplyr::mutate(id_test = as.factor(id_test),
                            inst = as.factor(inst),
                            qc = as.factor(qc),
                            notes = as.character(notes)) %>%
              rename(notes_kf = notes)

  notes_all <- dplyr::full_join(notes, 
                                notes_kf,
                                by = c("id_test",
                                       "inst",
                                       "qc",
                                       "id")) %>%
               dplyr::mutate(notes = paste0(notes_log,
                                            "; ",
                                            notes_kf),
                             notes = gsub("; NA", "", notes),
                             notes = gsub("NA;", "", notes))
```

# Save

* Saves the QC flags into a .RDS file.

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  saveRDS(notes_all, file = "../r_files/qc.RDS")
```
